name: Talk Brandt
_source: s;Brandt;The last time I saw you, you were but a boy accompanying his father.
s;Brandt;But no need for such formalities on my behalf, milord.
s;Brandt;What brings you to Lord Morrissey's lands, especially now of all times?
s;Brandt;Surely not.{w}{br}Your father built House Verstadt into a pillar of stength.
s;Brandt;Bandits and mosnters alike feared the legacy he built.
s;Simon;But a group attacked us regardless.
s;Simon;If not for Luther and Vincent, I'd probably be dead.
s;Brandt;You'd best speak with Lord Morrissey.
s;Brandt;Bandits and monsters only respect strength, young Verstadt.
s;Brandt;This is a lesson your father learned early.
s;Brandt;I hope for your sake you learn it soon too.
